original_text: She had heard the reports about Jesus and came up behind him in the crowd and touched his garment.
korean_text: 예수의 소문을 듣고 무리 가운데 끼어 뒤로 와서 그의 옷에 손을 대니

sentences.original_text: She had heard the reports about Jesus
and came up behind him in the crowd
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 무리 가운데서 그의 뒤로 다가와
